sentences.sContent: Don't just sit around ! Go for a walk, jog, swim or cycle. For a change, try dancing or doing callisthenics in time to your favourite tunes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't just sit around ! Go for a walk, jog, swim or cycle. For a change, try dancing or doing callisthenics in time to your favourite tunes.
sentences.sCn: 不要总是坐着不动！去散散步、慢跑、游泳或骑自行车。要不，换换方式，去跳舞或随着所喜欢的音乐节拍做健美体操。
